comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Edward Bennett Close--in 1915, that was Marjorie Merriweather Post, at one time the richest woman in America: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marjorie_Merriweather_Post She was mother of three daughters, including actress Dina Merrill: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dina_Merrill
